text: Vladan Stojković (born 22 January 1971) is a retired Serbian football goalkeeper. He is a brother of Vladimir Stojković and father of Vladimir Stojković, both fellow goalkeepers. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Serbian footballers Category:FK Spartak Subotica players Category:FK Mačva Šabac players Category:A.D. title: Vladan Stojković
